merchants.name: Clockwork Blacksmith II
introductions: Greetings, adventurer! I am a merchant, automaton series B.

merchants.name: Clockwork Merchant XXIII
introductions: Greetings, adventurer! I am a merchant, automaton series M.

directions.question: You spot a nearby Clockwork Guide and ask it what merchants are nearby.
directions.answer: Clockwork Guide XII: *mechanical whirring* Greetings, adventurer! I am a guide, automaton Series G! Here are the nearby merchants:
directions.notFound: Clockwork Guide XII: *eyes flash red* Query failed! Unknown target {{merchant_name}}!
